parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.26

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Time

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Mission Information

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Sets a time multiplier for in-game time. The command range is capped at 0.1 - 120 to avoid performance problems.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''setTimeMultiplier''' value

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> value: [[Number]] - has to be in range from 0.1 to 120

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setTimeMultiplier]] 60;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[setTimeMultiplier]] 0.5;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[timeMultiplier]], [[skipTime]], [[setAccTime]], [[accTime]], [[time]], [[serverTime]], [[date]], [[daytime]]
</value></part></template></root>
